snippet: Maggi Hambling may be best known for her portraits — of dead people. For the first time, she shares the bright, colorful London space where she lives and works....

headline.main: The Surprisingly Lively Home of a Controversial Artist
headline.print_headline: The Surprisingly Lively Home of a Controversial Artist

lead_paragraph: Maggi Hambling may be best known for her portraits — of dead people. For the first time, she shares the bright, colorful London space where she lives and works.
